Wel has this myllere v̉ernysshid his hed
Ful pale he was for drunkyn ⁊and not red
He yeskid and he spak thurgh the nose
As he were on the quakke or on the pose

As any Iay she light was and iolyfe

To bedde goth alan and also Iohn
Ther was no more he nedid no dwale
The myller has so wysely bibed ale
That as an hors he snoryd in his sleep ·
Ne of his tayle behynd took he no keep

Men myght here · hir routyng a furlong

Aleyn the clerk that herd that melody
He punchid Iohn ⁊and said sleepis thou
Herdist thou euyr suylk a song or now
Lo suylk a company is betwix hem alle
A wild fyre mot on here bodyes falle
Who herd euyr suylk a ferly thing
Ye thei shal haue the floure of euyl endyng
This long nyght ther tydes me no rest
But yit no force al shal be for the best
For Iohn said he als mot I thryue
Yif that I may yone wench wil I swyue
Sum easement has lawe shapyn vs
For Iohan ther is a lawe that says thus
That yif a man in one poynt be agreuyd
That in an othir he shal be releuyd
Oure corne is stolyn soothly yt is no nay
